verses.name: 1 John 5:9
verses.text: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.

verses.name: 1 John 5:10
verses.text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.

verses.name: 1 John 5:11
verses.text: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
